flavor: Luciana loved it when mamãe and papai finished work early, so they could all go home together.
stripped_text: click, take 1 tag: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, breach R&D. Use this ability only once per turn. Threat 3 -> Whenever you breach R&D during a run on Archives, access 1 additional card. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
text: [click], take 1 tag: Run Archives. If successful, instead of breaching Archives, breach R&D. Use this ability only once per turn. Threat 3 → Whenever you breach R&D during a run on Archives, access 1 additional card. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
title: Eru Ayase-Pessoa

flavor: "How far shall we go this time?"
stripped_text: click: Gain click. Run a remote server. When that run ends, if it was unsuccessful, take 1 tag. Use this ability only once per turn. click, trash: Gain click click. Remove 1 tag.
text: [click]: Gain [click]. Run a remote server. When that run ends, if it was unsuccessful, take 1 tag. Use this ability only once per turn. [click], [trash]: Gain [click][click]. Remove 1 tag.
title: Hannah "Wheels" Pilintra

flavor: I decided; I am free.
stripped_text: Whenever you breach HQ or R&D during a run, if you did not break any subroutines during that run, you may access 1 additional card. Use this ability only once per turn.
text: Whenever you breach HQ or R&D during a run, if you did not break any subroutines during that run, you may access 1 additional card. Use this ability only once per turn.
title: Mercury: Chrome Libertador

flavor: Even the tiniest scrap of data can become the key to riches.
stripped_text: The Corp may reveal an agenda from HQ. If they do, gain click and draw 1 card. Otherwise, look at the top 3 cards of R&D.
text: The Corp may reveal an agenda from HQ. If they do, gain [click] and draw 1 card. Otherwise, look at the top 3 cards of R&D.
title: Chrysopoeian Skimming

stripped_text: Run a central server. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, bypass it. Threat 4 -> The second time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, you may spend click to bypass it. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.)
text: Run a central server. The first time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, bypass it. Threat 4 → The second time you encounter a piece of ice during that run, you may spend [click] to bypass it. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.)
title: S-Dobrado

flavor:
"One day I looked into the mirror and saw not my own reflection, but a new friend eager to help me."
—Mercury
stripped_text: Whenever you bypass a piece of ice, you may remove this hardware from the game to derez that ice.
text: Whenever you bypass a piece of ice, you may remove this hardware from the game to derez that ice.
title: Capybara

flavor: This world is not beautiful, and yet that is why it is.
stripped_text: +1 mu Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, add 1 unrezzed card to HQ. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +1[mu] Whenever an agenda is scored or stolen, add 1 unrezzed card to HQ. Limit 1 console per player.
title: Hermes

flavor: Dazzle. Disorient. Disappear.
stripped_text: Whenever you encounter a piece of AP, destroyer, or observer ice, you may trash this program to bypass that ice.
text: Whenever you encounter a piece of AP, destroyer, or observer ice, you may trash this program to bypass that ice.
title: Laser Pointer

flavor: Art knows no borders.
stripped_text: 0 credits: Install 1 program from your grip (paying all costs). Use this ability only once per turn and only during a run. When that run ends, trash that program if it is not a trojan.
text: 0[credit]: Install 1 program from your grip (paying all costs). Use this ability only once per turn and only during a run. When that run ends, trash that program if it is not a trojan.
title: Arissana Rocha Nahu: Street Artist

flavor: Leaps and bounds better than the competition!
stripped_text: +2 mu The first time each turn you install a program, you may draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.
text: +2[mu] The first time each turn you install a program, you may draw 1 card. Limit 1 console per player.
title: LilyPAD

stripped_text: Install only on a piece of ice. Threat 4 -> When you install this program, it gets +3 strength for the remainder of the turn. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 subroutine on a sentry protecting this server. 1 credit: +2 strength.
text: Install only on a piece of ice. Threat 4 → When you install this program, it gets +3 strength for the remainder of the turn. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 subroutine on a sentry protecting this server. 1[credit]: +2 strength.
title: Living Mural

stripped_text: Run any server. If successful, resolve 2 of the following in any order:  Draw 2 cards.  Install 1 card from your grip, paying 1 credit less.  Remove 1 tag.  Place 4 credits on this event. You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs for the remainder of this run.
text:
Run any server. If successful, resolve 2 of the following in any order:
• Draw 2 cards.
• Install 1 card from your grip, paying 1[credit] less.
• Remove 1 tag.
• Place 4[credit] on this event. You can spend hosted credits to pay trash costs for the remainder of this run.
title: Bahia Bands

flavor: "Free" as in markets, "cheap" as in beer.
stripped_text: Whenever you finish taking an action, if you have taken that action exactly 3 times this turn, gain click.
text: Whenever you finish taking an action, if you have taken that action exactly 3 times this turn, gain [click].
title: Wage Workers

flavor: We make these arms for all, so that none who oppose peace would risk their own destruction.
stripped_text: trash: End the run unless the Runner spends click. Use this ability only during a run on this server. Subroutine The Runner loses click. Subroutine The Runner loses click. Subroutine End the run.
text: [trash]: End the run unless the Runner spends [click]. Use this ability only during a run on this server. [subroutine] The Runner loses [click]. [subroutine] The Runner loses [click]. [subroutine] End the run.
title: M.I.C.

flavor: "Haas-Bioroid deeply appreciates your assistance in locating our... employee."
stripped_text: Gain 5 credits. You may install 1 card from HQ. You may remove 1 tag to place 1 advancement counter on that card.
text: Gain 5[credit]. You may install 1 card from HQ. You may remove 1 tag to place 1 advancement counter on that card.
title: Greasing the Palm

flavor: He single-handedly keeps several departments running, provided they give him all the mint tea he wants.
stripped_text: The rez cost of each piece of ice protecting this server is lowered by 2 credits. Threat 4 -> The rez cost of each card in the root of this server is lowered by 2 credits. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) When your turn ends, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server.
text: The rez cost of each piece of ice protecting this server is lowered by 2[credit]. Threat 4 → The rez cost of each card in the root of this server is lowered by 2[credit]. (This ability is active if any player has 4 or more agenda points.) When your turn ends, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server.
title: Vovô Ozetti

flavor: Caveant Fugitivi.
stripped_text: Limit 2 remote servers. The first time each turn you install a card in the root of or protecting a remote server, you may install 1 card from HQ in the root of or protecting another remote server, ignoring all costs. You cannot score the second card this turn.
text:
Limit 2 remote servers.
The first time each turn you install a card in the root of or protecting a remote server, you may install 1 card from HQ in the root of or protecting another remote server, ignoring all costs. You cannot score the second card this turn.
title: A Teia: IP Recovery

flavor: Deep down, she knew Benício wasnʼt coming back.
stripped_text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, do 2 net damage.
text: When this agenda is scored or stolen, do 2 net damage.
title: Fujii Asset Retrieval

flavor: "Do you take walk-ins?"
stripped_text: Rez only during your turn. The first run each turn cannot be made against a remote server. The first time each turn a run on Archives begins, if this server is not protected by ice, do 2 net damage.
text:
Rez only during your turn.
The first run each turn cannot be made against a remote server.
The first time each turn a run on Archives begins, if this server is not protected by ice, do 2 net damage.
title: Front Company

stripped_text: Threat 3 -> The Runner cannot spend credits while subroutines on this ice are resolving. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.) Subroutine Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 2 credits. Subroutine Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 2 credits. Subroutine Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 2 credits.
text: Threat 3 → The Runner cannot spend credits while subroutines on this ice are resolving. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.) [subroutine] Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 2[credit]. [subroutine] Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 2[credit]. [subroutine] Do 1 net damage unless the Runner pays 2[credit].
title: Attini

flavor:
"When you stretch a mind it expands, sometimes until it snaps." 
—Adrian Seis
stripped_text: Resolve 1 of the following:  Gain 4 credits and draw 2 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D.  Do X net damage. X is equal to the number of tags the Runner has, up to 3.
text:
Resolve 1 of the following:
• Gain 4[credit] and draw 2 cards. Add 1 card from HQ to the top of R&D.
• Do X net damage. X is equal to the number of tags the Runner has, up to 3.
title: Mindscaping

flavor: Itʼs not that he can predict the future, itʼs just that heʼs seen it all before
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0-2 credits. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, the Runner cannot access cards other than this upgrade for the remainder of that run. If the bids match, the Runner cannot access this upgrade for the remainder of that run. When your turn ends, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server.
text: Whenever the Runner makes a successful run on this server, play a Psi Game. (Players secretly bid 0–2[credit]. Then each player reveals and spends their bid.) If the bids differ, the Runner cannot access cards other than this upgrade for the remainder of that run. If the bids match, the Runner cannot access this upgrade for the remainder of that run. When your turn ends, you may move this upgrade to the root of another server.
title: Adrian Seis

flavor: Results, Delivered.
stripped_text: The first time each turn the Runner steals or trashes a Corp card, place 1 power counter on this identity. click, hosted power counter: Look at the top 3 cards of R&D. You may install 1 of those cards.
text: The first time each turn the Runner steals or trashes a Corp card, place 1 power counter on this identity. [click], hosted power counter: Look at the top 3 cards of R&D. You may install 1 of those cards.
title: Epiphany Analytica: Nations Undivided

flavor:
"You really thought weʼd let you keep this data?"
—The Holo Man
stripped_text: When the Runner steals this agenda, give them 1 tag. click, remove 1 tag: Shuffle this agenda into R&D. The Corp can use this ability only if this agenda is in the Runner's score area.
text: When the Runner steals this agenda, give them 1 tag. [click], remove 1 tag: Shuffle this agenda into R&D. The Corp can use this ability only if this agenda is in the Runner's score area.
title: Oracle Thinktank

flavor: "A lively but peaceful crowd of concerned counter-protesters have come out to—damn it, cut! Can we get the sledgehammer out of the frame?"
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may choose a card type to look at the top card of R&D. If that card has the chosen type, you may reveal it and gain 2 credits.
text: When your turn begins, you may choose a card type to look at the top card of R&D. If that card has the chosen type, you may reveal it and gain 2[credit].
title: Balanced Coverage

flavor: Be afraid.
stripped_text: While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it. When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 4 credits to give them 2 tags.
text:
While the Runner is accessing this asset in R&D, they must reveal it.
When the Runner accesses this asset anywhere except in Archives, you may pay 4[credit] to give them 2 tags.
title: Behold!

flavor: Raising money is useful, but discovering which politician is in need of it is vastly more important.
stripped_text: When your turn begins, you may look at the top 3 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order. Then, if this server is not protected by ice, you may draw 1 card.
text: When your turn begins, you may look at the top 3 cards of R&D and arrange them in any order. Then, if this server is not protected by ice, you may draw 1 card.
title: Federal Fundraising

flavor:
"No one has ever told me to get lost so politely." 
—Arissana Rocha Nahu
stripped_text: Whenever the Runner passes this ice after encountering it, if they did not break its printed subroutine with a decoder during that encounter, give them 1 tag. Subroutine The Runner loses 1 credit.
text: Whenever the Runner passes this ice after encountering it, if they did not break its printed subroutine with a decoder during that encounter, give them 1 tag. [subroutine] The Runner loses 1[credit].
title: Virtual Service Agent

stripped_text: Play only if the Runner stole or trashed a Corp card during their last turn. After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends. Give the Runner 2 tags. Threat 3 -> You may pay 5 credits to give the Runner 2 tags. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
text: Play only if the Runner stole or trashed a Corp card during their last turn. After you resolve this operation, your action phase ends. Give the Runner 2 tags. Threat 3 → You may pay 5[credit] to give the Runner 2 tags. (This ability is active if any player has 3 or more agenda points.)
title: Oppo Research

flavor: Merely a fun little personality test.
stripped_text: Gain 1 credit for each card in HQ.
text: Gain 1[credit] for each card in HQ.
title: Your Digital Life

flavor: Acres of rainforest live or die by quarterly revenue projections.
stripped_text: click, 1 credit, reveal and trash this agenda from HQ: Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card that you can advance.
text: [click], 1[credit], reveal and trash this agenda from HQ: Place 2 advancement counters on 1 installed card that you can advance.
title: Slash and Burn Agriculture

flavor: Nothingʼs as precious as a hole in the ground.
stripped_text: Whenever you rez a piece of ice, place 2 credits on this asset. You can spend hosted credits to pay install costs. trash: Take all credits from this asset.
text: Whenever you rez a piece of ice, place 2[credit] on this asset. You can spend hosted credits to pay install costs. [trash]: Take all credits from this asset.
title: Cybersand Harvester

flavor: The forest around them grew denser with each beat of their heart.
stripped_text: click, 1 credit, reveal and trash this ice from HQ: Place 3 advancement counters on 1 installed piece of ice. You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter. Subroutine Gain 1 credit. End the run.
text: [click], 1[credit], reveal and trash this ice from HQ: Place 3 advancement counters on 1 installed piece of ice. You can advance this ice. It gets +1 strength for each hosted advancement counter. [subroutine] Gain 1[credit]. End the run.
title: Tree Line

flavor:
"The only rule you need to remember is that it makes the rules." 
—Pumpkin-and-Dumplin
stripped_text: As an additional cost to rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity or remove 1 tag. Subroutine Gain 2 credits. Subroutine The Runner loses 2 credits. Subroutine End the run if you have more credits than the Runner.
text:
As an additional cost to rez this ice, take 1 bad publicity or remove 1 tag.
[subroutine] Gain 2[credit].
[subroutine] The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] End the run if you have more credits than the Runner.
title: Valentão

flavor: "Humans crafted me as a lie, but my patron helped me find the truth. This is my gift."
stripped_text: Remove 1 tag: End the run. You cannot use this ability during a run on this server.
text: Remove 1 tag: End the run. You cannot use this ability during a run on this server.
title: B-1001
